m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Economic Growth Has Decoupled From Carbon For Good September 13th, 2016 by Michael Barnard   Economic advancement goes through stages: agriculturally dominated societies to industrially dominated societies to consumer and information worker societies. It’s typically only as the shift to the consumer and information worker societies occurs that significant negative externalities such as climate change and air pollution start to be truly addressed by most nations.
